title: Bms or pes
content: Bms ece or pes(rr) ece or pes(ec)cse

comments.body: PES EC CSE if looking for placements or MS abroad in CSE :)

Pes rr ece for college and ece if you have interest. Masters in ece is must tho. Ece also have good prospects with masters


Pes ec cse for placements but I think choosing college will be wise here. 
Bms idk
unless u like ece, just take ec cse
Ohh thanks man I am going for ece .
Cse is crowded as hell and for me placement isn't the priority so might go for ece
Bro lol when you decided what to do, what’s the reason for making a post and asking us? lol
then take BMS, but compare the core ece placements of both of them, because if u want to avoid cse then no point doing ece and getting into IT either way.
